Text: Thanks!   I just finished downloading and burning and it's working great.  Good look.

It kept freezing while installing various dll files for me too before I updated.  Another thing is, after I updated, I had a hardware issues.  one of my drivers was faulty.  Make sure your hardware supports it.  If it still doesn't work for you, let me know.
